DOC.brief_summary: This purpose study measure concentration two anti-epileptic drug ( Eslicarbazepine acetate oxcarbazepine ) metabolites cerebrospinal fluid blood plasma healthy subject also assess drug tolerate .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetics Tolerability Multiple Doses Eslicarbazepine Acetate Oxcarbazepine
